turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Vankiva.
turn.2: Vankiva  Vankiva () is a locality situated in Hässleholm Municipality, Skåne County, Sweden with 340 inhabitants in 2010.
turn.3: What kind of services does Vankiva have?
turn.4: Besides the church (see below) Vankiva used to have a local store, gas station, train station and school (Vankiva School 1916-2010).
turn.5: Do these services still exist today?
turn.6: The store, gas station and school have been sold and re-purposed.
turn.7: What happened to the train station?
turn.8: After the train station was decommissioned its station building was used by the local Scouts, Malvan of KFUM-KFUK, until it was razed.
turn.9: What other types of services does Vankiva have?
turn.10: Vankiva have large football ground for the local club Vankiva IF with several grass fields and a gravel one.
turn.12: The football club yearly hosts a tournament called Ivar Persson Cup.
